feed.title: Windhawk Mod Updates
feed.subtitle: Updates in the official collection of Windhawk mods

entry.title: Better file sizes in Explorer details 1.0
entry.content:
Better file sizes in Explorer details

Explorer always shows file sizes in KBs in details, make it show MB/GB when appropriate.

Also, optionally make use the International Electronic Commission terms (e.g. KiB instead of KB). See also: Why does Explorer use the term KB instead of KiB?.

entry.title: Version Spoof 1.0.0
entry.content:
Version Spoof

This mod fakes the Windows version reported to applications. This is mainly useful if you want an application to look how it did on an earlier Windows version, such as using a native styled titlebar.

entry.title: Alt+Tab per monitor 1.0.0
entry.content:
Alt+Tab per monitor

When you press the Alt+Tab combination, the window switcher will appear on the primary display, showing all open windows across all monitors. This mod customizes the behavior to display the switcher on the monitor where the cursor is currently located, showing only the windows present on that specific monitor.

entry.title: Desktop icons view 1.0.2
entry.content: • Fixed applying the mod on startup on Windows 10.

entry.title: Taskbar on top for Windows 11 1.0.4
entry.content: • Fixed the start menu opening on the left side of the screen, even if the icons on the taskbar are centered. The bug was caused by the attempt to change the incorrect jump list animation in version 1.0.3. As a result, if icons are centered, jump list animation will be incorrect again. This affects only Windows 11 23H2, there's no such issue on Windows 11 24H2.

entry.title: Desktop icons view 1.0.1
entry.content:
• Added an option to select monitor number to have the desktop icons on.
  • Fixed the mod trying to customize folder lists and other lists which aren't part of the desktop.

entry.title: Taskbar height and icon size 1.2.16
entry.content: • Fixed a bug introduced in version 1.2.15, which mistakenly changes the width of elements such as the taskbar search box and the weather widget.

entry.title: Taskbar tray system icon tweaks 1.0
entry.content:
Taskbar tray system icon tweaks

Allows hiding system icons (volume, network, battery), the bell (always or when there are no new notifications), and the "Show desktop" button.

entry.title: Windows 11 Start Menu Styler 1.1.6
entry.content:
• Added themes: RosePine, Windows11_Metro10Minimal.
  • Updated existing themes.
  • Added a workaround for hanging the start menu process on Windows 10. Although the available themes and example styles are designed for Windows 11, it should now be possible to use the mod on Windows 10 too.

entry.title: Windows 11 Notification Center Styler 1.1.4
entry.content: • Updated the TranslucentShell theme to make the text more readable when on a light background.

entry.title: Windows 11 Taskbar Styler 1.3.8
entry.content:
• Added themes: CleanSlate, Lucent.
  • Updated existing themes.

entry.title: Taskbar hung windows rearrangement fix 1.0
entry.content:
Taskbar hung windows rearrangement fix

Fixes a taskbar bug which causes taskbar items of hung windows to move to the end of the taskbar. For more details about the bug, check out the following blog post: Hung windows and taskbar buttons rearrangement.

Only Windows 10 64-bit and Windows 11 are supported. For other Windows versions check out 7+ Taskbar Tweaker.

Note: To customize the old taskbar on Windows 11 (if using ExplorerPatcher or a similar tool), enable the relevant option in the mod's settings.

entry.title: Classic Explorer navigation bar 1.0.6
entry.content: • The fix from version 1.0.5 only worked for Windows 11 version 24H2 (incorrect height if the FileExplorerTabLineFix Windows flag is set). Now the fix works for Windows 11 version 23H2 as well.

entry.title: Taskbar auto-hide when maximized 1.0
entry.content:
Taskbar auto-hide when maximized

Automatically hides the taskbar when a window is maximized, and brings it back when there are no maximized windows.

entry.title: Resource Redirect 1.1.8
entry.content:
• "Redirect all loaded resources" mode: Fixed icon loading in case the redirection module has different icon formats.
  • "Redirect all loaded resources" mode: String resources are now redirected in more cases.
  • Fixed a rare crash that could occur if logging is enabled or if the "Redirect all loaded resources (experimental)" option is enabled.

entry.title: Taskbar height and icon size 1.2.15
entry.content: • Applying changes to the taskbar button width option no longer requires restarting explorer.

entry.title: Fix Qt scrollbar grippers 1.1
entry.content: • Fix control detection. \ Previously, we attempted to draw the gripper overlay for any control that existed, not just scrollbars. This is because the control theme opened by the HTHEME was not checked. Now, we only try drawing scrollbar grippers if we know the control itself is a scrollbar.

entry.title: Logon, Logoff & Shutdown Sounds Restored 1.0.2
entry.content: • Improved XP mode accuracy per @aubymori's suggestion

entry.title: Vertical Taskbar for Windows 11 1.3
entry.content:
• Fixed jump lists being cut off when opened near the edge of the screen.
  • Added a vertical alignment option for jump lists.
  • Adjusted jump list animations to slide from the correct direction.
  • Fixed tooltips overlapping with the taskbar in Windows 11 version 24H2.
  • Improved support for some devices, mostly tablets and devices with a touchscreen.
  • Improved compatibility with some programs which query the taskbar location, such as EarTrumpet.
  • This update requires Windhawk 1.5 or newer. If you're using an older Windhawk version, please update.

entry.title: Taskbar tray icon spacing 1.1
entry.content:
• Renamed from "Taskbar notification icon spacing" to "Taskbar tray icon spacing", as tray is the more familiar term.
  • Added support for more system icons, including the chevron icon, microphone, keyboard, language, and others.
  • Added two options to customize the tray overflow: "Tray overflow icon width" and "Tray overflow icons per row".
